data.name: Muse Dash - Just as planned
data.detailed_description:
[Just as Planned] DLC
Purchase [Just as Planned] to unlock a complete collection of music (now over 300 songs), characters, elfins, welcome screens, and illustrations!
On top of that, future updates on Muse Dash will be unlocked for free ✓
That's to say, after purchasing [Just as Planned], there's no need to pay for any further updates on Muse Dash (ゝ∀･) ~

Attention!
[Just as Planned] and music packs purchased COULD NOT BE USED across platforms. Before purchasing, please make sure that the platform is the frequently used one!
If you wish to play Muse Dash across multiple devices, you can log in to your bound account on the mobile device by going into "Options" → "Account" to sync your level and saved data, etc. (★-ω-)b

Privileges of [Just as Planned]
Default songs and some free illustrations can be unlocked through an upgrade.
Once you purchase [Just as Planned], you can enjoy a 1.5x EXP boost permanently!
Anyway, level-up 114514 first ⊂彡☆))∀`)!

data.short_description: The movement of our world has been adapted.Can you hear my whispering? Now Game Start!!——
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, English, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.00 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X Lion 10.7, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
